channel.title: GCP Updates on nownab.log
channel.description: Recent content in GCP Updates on nownab.log

item.title: GCP Updates | August 5, 2019
item.description: STORAGE & DATABASES Cloud Storage – dual-regional bucket locations: GA Combine the performance boost of having two specific regional locations for object data storage with the advantages of geo-redundancy. Documentation dual-regional は multi-regional の特別なやつらしい。Console で試してみると、 nam4 (Iowa and South Carolina) us (multiple region in United States) み

item.title: GCP Updates | May 28, 2019
item.description: 再開しました。 HYBRID & MULTI-CLOUD Anthos Config Management: GA Manage configuration and enforce policy across your clusters – whether they’re on-premises or in the cloud. Set a declarative configuration for role-based access controls, resource quotas, and Namespaces – all from a single place. Documentation | Blog GitOpsみたいなことが
